attributes.action: Ensure better rail travel for Scotland
attributes.additional_details: Whether it being late for work, appointments, or taking away time that could be spent with loved ones, Scotrail continues to disappoint.
attributes.background: The people of Scotland can all vouch that they have had an issue with Scotrail at least once in their lives, if not everyday. The amount of delays & cancellations is absolutely ridiculous. This should not be the case in a country like this when every other country in Europe seems to be coping fine.
